story.title: Sin Luz: Life without power in the longest blackout in U.S. history
description: Puerto Ricans are in limbo. Millions still have no safe water, schools remain shut and the tasks of daily life are exhausting and dangerous. Full electricity may be months way.
story.role: Drone pilot, photogrammetry capture/model reconstruction, web developer

media.alt: Drone footage of the aftermath of hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico
media.caption: Drone footage of the aftermath of hurricane Maria in Puerto Rico

media.alt: Screen recording of the scroll interaction showing video and 3-D reconstruction of hurricane damage on the Sin Luz webpage
media.caption: Scroll interaction showing video and 3-D reconstruction of hurricane damage

story.awards: Emmy Nomination, World Press Photo Silver Medal, Scripts Howard Award for Multimedia Reporting
